title: Can't map my forward and back mouse buttons
body: Title pretty much says it all. A few weeks ago I all of a sudden couldn't use my forward/back buttons on the side of my  mouse. I don't know if its some option or something I did accidentally, but it is very frustrating and I can't figure out how to fix it. All my google searches bring up posts from years ago and address some other issue. Currently I am getting by with a software that i used to remap the buttons to the item keys. But it then doesn't let me use the buttons as forward and back outside of the game. I even formatted my computer (for a different reason) and it is still happening, so I believe that it is some option in the game settings or something. Thank you all for any help. -Lex

replies.body: Sylvyr9 is right that this may be due to a Creator Update on Windows 10, which is preventing some mouse buttons from binding.  In this case, a roll back is suggested if you want to use those.  I don't have anymore info for now, but will keep an eye out.
Ran into the same issue. From what I've noticed, it may have to do with the new Windows 10 Creators update. I guess all we can do is wait for a fix.

Twitch has probably been meddling with your mouse or keyboard. [Pest Control will help you get rid of him.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues)
